top.title: Iran students stage first large anti-government protests since deadly crackdown
top.summary: The student protesters honoured thousands of those killed when nationwide mass protests were put down last month.

top.title: Killing of nationalist student leaves French far left in deep trouble as elections loom
top.summary: Far-left militants are suspected of being behind Quentin Deranque's death and the party of Jean-Luc Mélenchon is being widely condemned.

top.title: Nasa astronauts' moon mission delayed due to rocket issue
top.summary: The mission to the far side of the Moon and back will be postponed after problems with were spotted with its rocket, a Nasa official said.

top.title: Why fake AI videos of UK urban decline are taking over social media
top.summary: Deepfakes showing grim taxpayer-funded waterparks have gone viral and drawn some racist responses.

top.title: Tumbler Ridge suspect's ChatGPT account banned before shooting
top.summary: OpenAI said the account's activity did not meet the threshold to flag it to authorities when it was identified.

top.title: Urgent research needed to tackle AI threats, says Google AI boss
top.summary: But the head of the US delegation at the AI Impact Summit in Delhi says: "We totally reject global governance of AI."

title.#text: Arturia’s FX Collection 6 adds two new effects and a $99 intro version
Georgia says Elon Musk’s America PAC violated election law
Suspect in Tumbler Ridge school shooting described violent scenarios to ChatGPT
